Html:
Currently there is two Irony assembly version - for .Net Framework and Silverlight.
I think it will be good idea to create PCL (portable) assembly.
I've created pull request where I've introduce Irony.Shared project, that is Net4.5/Sl5/Win8 portable assembly:
https://irony.codeplex.com/SourceControl/network/forks/darkman666/PCL/contribution/7486
